price: Kuma kalmar Ubangijinka tã cika, tanã gaskiya* da ãdalci. Babu mai musanyãwa ga kalmõminSa, kuma Shi ne Maiji, Masani.
arabic: وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدۡقٗا وَعَدۡلٗاۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes: * Musulunci kõ Alƙur'ãni ne cikon addinin Allah, babu mai iya zõwa da wani abu sãbo kõ ya ƙãra wani abu a cikin sa ta kõwace hanya kuma bãbu mai iya musanya wani abu a cikinsa. Ya cika ya kammala, sai biya kawai. Annabi ya ce: "Wanda ya yi wani aiki ba da umuruinsa a kan abin da ya aikata ɗin nan ba, to, an mayar masa; ba a karɓaba.".

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watammat kalimatu rabbika ṣid'qan waʿadlan lā mubaddila likalimātihi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
